data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Arena Corinthians.
In the minute 2, Coritiba are coming forward and Sassa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Leo Natel of Corinthians smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Coritiba.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Corinthians.
Coritiba are pushing forward but Neilton's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 7, Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Sidcley of Corinthians gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 8, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Sao Paulo Coritiba's Sassa is caught offside.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Braulio da Silva Machado awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, Braulio da Silva Machado awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Arena Corinthians.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 13, Corinthians pushes forward through Angelo Araos, whose finish on goal is saved.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Corinthians's Jo gets in a shot on goal at Arena Corinthians. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 16, Yan Sasse (Coritiba) sees red and is sent off in Sao Paulo!
Free kick Corinthians.
Angelo Araos (Corinthians) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 19, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 22, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Corinthians throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
In the minute 24, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Coritiba close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
In the minute 25, Throw-in Coritiba.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
Corinthians have been given a penalty at Arena Corinthians...
In the minute 28, At Arena Corinthians, Patrick Vieira has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Corinthians are awarded a penalty ... Jo botches the spot kick!
Corinthians have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Coritiba's Wilson looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 33, Play has been interrupted briefly in Sao Paulo to check on Wilson, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 34, Robson for Coritiba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Arena Corinthians.
Corinthians's Ramiro misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Coritiba at Arena Corinthians.
Leo Natel's header is off-target for Corinthians.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Arena Corinthians.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Goal! Leo Natel gives Corinthians a 1-0 lead.
Gabriel with an assist there.
In the minute 39, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Matheus Galdezani gets his shot on target but fails to score for Coritiba.
Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Coritiba.
Goal! Coritiba go level at 1-1 through Sassa in Sao Paulo.
That's a fine assist from William Matheus.
In the minute 44, Coritiba have a goal kick.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in high up the field for Coritiba in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 45, Patrick Vieira for the away team is judged to be offside.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Coritiba to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Coritiba's Neilton breaks free at Arena Corinthians. But the strike goes wide of the post.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Arena Corinthians.
In the minute 46, Corinthians's Leo Natel misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
Gustavo Silva is on a sub for Ramiro for Corinthians.
Tiago Nunes (Corinthians) is making a second substitution, with Ederson replacing Gabriel.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 47, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Coritiba throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a throw-in for Coritiba, close to Corinthians's area.
Corinthians needs to be cautious. Coritiba have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 48, Important block from the Corinthians defence as Sassa fires in a strike for Coritiba.
Goal! Corinthians have taken a 2-1 lead courtesy of a header from Jo.
Great play from Angelo Araos to set up the goal.
In the minute 51, Sidcley (Corinthians) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Gil (Corinthians) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in Coritiba.
Neilton for Coritiba drives towards goal at Arena Corinthians. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Corinthians push forward at Arena Corinthians and Gustavo Silva gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Coritiba defence.
In the minute 56, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Coritiba have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
In the minute 59, In Sao Paulo Corinthians drive forward through Gustavo Silva. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Sao Paulo, Angelo Araos of Corinthians is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Jo of Corinthians gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Coritiba at Arena Corinthians.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Arena Corinthians.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Igor Jesus is replacing Neilton for Coritiba at Arena Corinthians.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
The away team have replaced Robson with Wellisol. This is the second substitution made today by Eduardo Barroca.
Ederson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Corinthians.
Corinthians's Jo is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 67, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 70, Tiago Nunes is making the team's third substitution at Arena Corinthians with Ruan de Oliveira replacing Leo Natel.
The home team have replaced Sidcley with Lucas Piton Crivellaro. This is the fourth substitution made today by Tiago Nunes.
Braulio da Silva Machado blows against Coritiba's Sassa for offside.
In the minute 72, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Lucas Piton Crivellaro is booked for the home team.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Arena Corinthians.
Can Coritiba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Corinthians's half?
In the minute 76, The home team replace Victor Cantillo with Guilherme Camacho.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Luiz Henrique is replacing Matheus Bueno for Coritiba at Arena Corinthians.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Coritiba make their fourth substitution with Matheus Sales replacing Matheus Galdezani.
In the minute 80, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Coritiba have a dangerous throw-in.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Coritiba.
In the minute 82, Braulio da Silva Machado awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Corinthians push upfield and Jo gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Coritiba defence.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Coritiba throw-in in Corinthians's half.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Corinthians.
Goal! Corinthians extend their lead to 3-1 through Gustavo Silva.
Lucas Piton Crivellaro instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In Sao Paulo Corinthians drive forward through Angelo Araos. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Braulio da Silva Machado will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Sassa for Coritiba drives towards goal at Arena Corinthians. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-1.
